**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 [Scarlet Triad Thug](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1551) **Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 16 **Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9), _+1 [flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)_, [keys to manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (3), [average manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) (marked with the symbol of the Scarlet Triad) --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +12 **Will** +15 +2 circumstance on saves vs. [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), or being knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) **HP** 120 **Rock Dwarf** When [forced to move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 10 feet or more, the thug is moved only half the distance.
**Bully's Push** **Trigger** A creature within the thug's reach misses the thug with a melee Strike. **Effect** The thug attempts to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the triggering creature at a –2 penalty. If the thug rolls a critical failure, it gets a failure instead. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _flail_ +18 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning **Ranged** javelin +15 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 1d6+10 piercing **Efficient Capture** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The thug has [manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) in hand and is next to a creature. **Effect** The thug attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. The thug must succeed at an attack roll with a +18 modifier against the target's AC. **Pack Attack** The thug deals an extra 1d8 damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the thug's allies.
name: Scarlet Triad Thug
